import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Serverurl } from "../Common/ServerUrl"; import axios from "axios"; import $ from "jquery"; import swal from "sweetalert"; export class UpdateCoupon extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { couponData: {}, couponId: "", // code: "", // discount: "", status: "", error1: "", // error2: "", // error3: "", errorText: "", }; } componentDidMount() { // var categoryData; var id = localStorage.getItem("couponId"); console.log("couponId is: ", id); this.setState({ couponId: id, }); axios({ method: "get", url: Serverurl + "coupon_show/" + id, // data: categoryData, headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}`, }, config: { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, }, }) .then((res) => { console.log( "coupon_show in componentDidMount() of UpdateCoupon' res.data is: ", res.data ); this.setState({ couponData: res.data, // code: res.data.code, // discount: res.data.discount, status: res.data.status, }); console.log( "res.data from coupon_show api in then() of UpdateCoupon is: ", res.data ); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); if (err) { console.log( "err from coupon_show api in UpdateCoupon is: ", err.response ); console.log({ err }); } }); } handleStatusInput(e) { this.setState({ status: e.target.value, error1: "", }); } render() { return (
